response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to me and I believe it would be a significant asset to you as well. Given its worth to both of us, I am extending an offer to sell it to you for $950,000.

This price reflects my desire to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction while also allowing you to secure this remarkable product at a competitive rate. I understand its value to you is estimated at $1,000,000, so this offer presents a favorable opportunity for you to own it without exceeding your budget.

Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I am looking forward to the possibility of working with you and bringing this product into your possession.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
